    • GetFilm

      public Film GetFilm(Integer filmId)
      Find Actor with matching ID.
      Parameters:
      filmId - - ID of Film to be found.
      Returns:
      Film with matching ID - or throw NOT_FOUND if no Films found.

    • AddFilm

      public Film AddFilm(FilmDTO filmDTO)
      Add new Film to the repository.
      Parameters:
      filmDTO - - Film DTO that holds the new Film's data.
      Returns:
      The newly created and added Film.

    • UpdateFilm

      public Film UpdateFilm(Integer filmId, FilmDTO filmDTO)
      Update an existing Film's fields with new data.
      Parameters:
      filmId - - The ID of the Film to be updated.
      filmDTO - - Holds the new data to insert into the given Film.
      Returns:
      The updated Film.

    • DeleteFilm

      public Film DeleteFilm(Integer filmId)
      Attempts to delete the Film with matching ID from the database.

      NOTE: Database constraints will override and prevent the deletion.
      Parameters:
      filmId - - ID of the Actor to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Film that was attempted to be deleted.

    • UpdateFilmActor

      public void UpdateFilmActor(Integer filmId, Set<Integer> actorIds)
      Updates the FilmActor table to replace all of Film's old Actors with the new Actors.
      Parameters:
      filmId - - ID of Film that was updated.
      actorIds - - List of new Actors's IDs associated with the Film.
